name: GhastLee
description:
Play as GhastLee, the Ghastly Ghost and try not to fade out of existence! Expel the souls of unsuspecting citizens and trap them on your plane of existence. Careful though! Busters of ghosts are out to suck you up with their portable vacuum cleaners!

Okay so I pretty much finished making the game but I had to rush a fair bit as I didn't leave myself enough time for each aspect, which is quite evident when you play it. I had a blast participating in this jam though, not my first jam but actually the first where I had something to submit by the deadline. In light of this first success, I'm going to look at what I did right and what I did wrong and try to improve for future jams. I'll be putting this into a short video along with the time lapse of the development over the next few days.

Thanks for stopping by and any feedback would be much appreciated :)
